subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: In light of all that has happened the last two years — both to Martin Truex Jr. and his longtime girlfriend, Sherry Pollex — it has been a remarkable comeback.
snippet: In light of all that has happened the last two years — both to Martin Truex Jr. and his longtime girlfriend, Sherry Pollex — it has been a remarkable comeback.
